page.title: 18Fashions In Keighley
page.content:
Most people probably think that young people wear blue denim jeans. We decided to investigate the fashion trends.
We wrote to local fashion clothes shops and found that most women wear pastel shades and the most popular sizes were 12 and 14 with a fair number of 10 and 16. Skirts, tops and dresses were sold the most.
The most popular sizes in shirts for men were 15 and 16, waist sizes 32 and 34 and leg length 31 and 32. The colours for men were also pastel shades and, surprisingly, a large number of mens' pink tops were sold.
Looking around at what people are wearing tends to confirm that pastels are the "in" colour. What for 1986?
